mapper.select: /* selectPopupList */ SELECT A.POPUP_SN , A.POPUP_TITLE , A.POPUP_CONTENT , A.POPUP_WIDTH , A.POPUP_HEIGHT , A.DISPLAY_YN , A.LINK_URL , (SELECT FILE_USER_NM FROM TB_FILE F WHERE F.FILE_DATA_SN = A.POPUP_SN AND F.USE_STATE = 'Y' AND F.FILE_CONTENT_CD = 'body') AS FILE_USER_NM_BODY , (SELECT FILE_PATH FROM TB_FILE F WHERE F.FILE_DATA_SN = A.POPUP_SN AND F.USE_STATE = 'Y' AND F.FILE_CONTENT_CD = 'body') AS FILE_PATH_BODY , A.POPUP_CAT , C.CODE_NM AS POPUP_CAT_NM FROM TB_POPUP A INNER JOIN TB_ADM B ON (B.ADM_SN = A.REG_SN) INNER JOIN TB_CODE C ON (C.CODE_ID = A.POPUP_CAT) WHERE A.USE_STATE = 'Y' AND A.DISPLAY_YN = 'Y' AND C.DISPLAY_YN = 'Y' AND A.POPUP_ID = #{popup_id} ORDER BY A.POPUP_SN DESC
